Eva's Spirit Lanya: Oh,you brought Hard Leather! Thank you!But it's not over. Now I need the 3rdmaterial,which is Fire Energy from the Forge of the Gods The Forge of the Gods is where the Fire Energy is embodied with the power of the gods resider. I heard that Fire Energy can create very powerful weapons. Goddess Eva asked for it herself, so get moving! Now,now! Are you ready?! [Quest Q10369_NoblesseSoulTesting Lanya-5.htm|"Say you are ready"]
